tool.name: demo3D09
tool.help:
**Description**
demo3D09 synthesizes one 3D image with nuclear, cell shape, and lysosomal channels from LAMP2 model with sampling method set to render lysosomes as ellipsoids without convolution. Also, demo3D09 renders 2D mean projections along XY, XZ, and YZ axes of image. This model was trained from the Murphy Lab 3D HeLa dataset, which is included in CellOrganizer.
-----
**Inputs**
- Seed for the pseudo-random number generator - Image compression algorithm
-----
**Output**
- A zip file with three TIFF (.tif) files for the cell shape, lysosomal, and nuclear channels
